Text: i have to stop seeding for a few hours, i apologize for any inconvenience, will return seeding at full capacity in few hours....once again, sorry...mc.
I notice the audio commentary is already activated.  If we burn the movie, will that be stuck?  Can we turn that setting off, with a DVD burn?

well....its included as a second audio track...therefore, if you burn it as a datadisc, when it plays it will play the original audio track, and you can activate the commentary track by hitting the audio button on your dvd remote control, which will scroll you through the audio tracks (of which there are 2). im not sure if you can "un-mux" the second track, you will have to google around to see if thats possible.
Please seed. I just need the extras. Thank you.
